lang-dir: The writing direction of the language. Should be 'rtl' (right-to-left) or 'ltr' (left-to-right) only
piTime-no-css-1: Shown when loading the timer without any css (first row)
piTime-no-css-2: Shown when loading the timer without any css (second row). Use `$1` insted of the link to the time (check en.json for reference)
piTime-dev-tool-title: The title shown in the 'developer tool' popup
piTime-parameters-title: The title of the url parameters, shown in the 'developer tool' popup
